001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.conversion;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.Version;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.module.SimpleModule;
005import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
006import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
007import org.bitcoinj.core.Block;
008import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
009import org.bitcoinj.crypto.ECKey;
010import org.bitcoinj.core.NetworkParameters;
011import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
012import org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction;
013
014/**
015 *
016 */
017public class RpcClientModule extends SimpleModule {
018    /**
019     * @param network Which network we are going to be a client for
020     * @param strictAddressParsing set to {@code false} to not throw exception on addresses from other networks
021     */
022    public RpcClientModule(Network network, boolean strictAddressParsing) {
023        super("BitcoinJMappingClient", new Version(1, 0, 0, null, null, null));
024
025        NetworkParameters netParams = NetworkParameters.of(network);
026        this.addDeserializer(Address.class, new AddressDeserializer(strictAddressParsing ? netParams : null))
027                .addDeserializer(Block.class, new BlockHexDeserializer(netParams))
028                .addDeserializer(Coin.class, new CoinDeserializer())
029                .addDeserializer(ECKey.class, new ECKeyDeserializer())
030                .addDeserializer(Sha256Hash.class, new Sha256HashDeserializer())
031                .addSerializer(Address.class, new AddressSerializer())
032                .addSerializer(Coin.class, new CoinSerializer())
033                .addSerializer(ECKey.class, new ECKeySerializer())
034                .addSerializer(Sha256Hash.class, new Sha256HashSerializer())
035                .addSerializer(Transaction.class, new TransactionHexSerializer());
036    }
037
038    /**
039     * @param network Which network we are going to be a client for
040     */
041    public RpcClientModule(Network network) {
042        this(network, true);
043    }
044}
